description: Configuration for parameter sensitivity analysis sweeps

euclideanFadeStart.description: SHAPE value where euclidean algorithm begins fading out

euclideanFadeEnd.description: SHAPE value where euclidean algorithm fully fades out

syncopationCenter.description: SHAPE value where syncopation algorithm peaks (bell curve center)

syncopationWidth.description: Width of syncopation bell curve (higher = wider active range)

randomFadeStart.description: SHAPE value where random algorithm begins fading in

randomFadeEnd.description: SHAPE value where random algorithm fully fades in

controlSweep.description: Control parameter values to test at during each sweep
